# Government Tender Announcement
#### Contract Number: WS4171967437
#### Tender Reference Number: Doc4188541813

## Title
F1700-220262: Prefabricated Residence for Pinkut Spawning Channel

## Status
Expired Tender

## Summary

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has issued a call for proposals for the supply, delivery, and installation of a prefabricated residence and foundation at Pinkut Spawning Channel in British Columbia, Canada. The project involves pouring the foundation at the site and supplying, transporting, delivering, unloading, and installing the prefabricated residence during the accessible season, which is typically from May to October. 

## Key Requirements

* Supply, delivery, and installation of one prefabricated residence and foundation
* Pouring the foundation at the site
* Supplying, transporting, delivering, unloading, and installing the prefabricated residence within the accessible season
* Compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and standards

## Project Details
* Tender Closing Date: October 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EDT)
* Anticipated Contract Start Date: November 1, 2023
* Anticipated Contract End Date: June 30, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia, Canada

## Who to Contact
For more information, contact:
Thomas Leboeuf, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can access the tender documentation and requirements on the following website:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17335318?extsite=MTczMzUzMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that, as this tender has expired, any bid submissions are not being accepted at this time.
